review_body: This is a nice idea for a game. It has the potential of being an addictive game, but the developer should do more in terms of hints and explanation. Probably a tutorial on combining colours or something in that line. I'm not an expert on colours so I never pass 3. Anyways it's nice and I'm looking f...Full ReviewThis is a nice idea for a game. It has the potential of being an addictive game, but the developer should do more in terms of hints and explanation. Probably a tutorial on combining colours or something in that line. I'm not an expert on colours so I never pass 3. Anyways it's nice and I'm looking forward to future improvements. Thumbs up Moore.

Really interesting game. It allows one to revisit primary colors and how they come together to form other colors. The increasing speed puts you on your toes and allows you to think on your toes. Really good one from the developer. Welldone
There's a small bug. When you're in the main menu, then switch apps, then return to Color Match, the falling colors get all synced up and weird. The dev should fix that!
